section.title: To-Do List Items by User and Incident
section.para: To view To-Do List items by user and Incident, select the "To-Do List Items by User and Incident" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: To-Do List Items by User and Incident

section.para: When displaying To-Do List items by user and Incident, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display To-Do List items for all users.
Select user whose To-Do List items you want to display.
Enter a user pattern to select a range of users. Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in .
Select to include all Incidents for the specified user(s) in the display.
Select the Incident you want to display information about.
Enter a range of To-Do List item start dates:
To-Do List items started on or after this date will be included in the display.
To-Do List items started on or before this date will be included in the display.
Enter a range of To-Do List item due dates:
To-Do List items due on or after this date will be included in the display.
To-Do List items due on or before this date will be included in the display.
Select to include completed To-Do List items in the display.
Select in include inactive To-Do List items in the display.
Display lists To-Do List items, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
